description.value:
The tip of a metallic dragon's claw is set into a band of silver. When you summon dragons using the claw, you must choose metallic dragons.

  • Armor After you cast a conjuration spell by activating the wyrm claw, you gain resistance 15 to acid, cold, electricity, and fire for the next minute.
  • Weapon After you cast a conjuration spell by activating the claw, you gain a Breath Weapon activity that takes 2 actions and deals 12d6 damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true]. Choose the area and type of damage when you use Breath Weapon: a @Template[type:line|distance:30] that deals acid, electricity, or fire, or a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals cold or fire. You can use this activity once before the end of your next turn.
